entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -9.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 5:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -9.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -14.8°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 20 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
